channel.title: Magic Shop of Raspberry

item.title: One Week with the Logitech MX Keys Mini Keyboard
item.description: I have finally discovered my dream keyboard.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Magic Shop of Raspberry is the unused stage 5 theme of Touhou Gensoukyou ~ Lotus Land Story (東方幻想郷 ～ Lotus Land Story), which was released at Comiket 54 in the summer of 1998. In this game, Marisa Kirisame returns as a playable character for the second time, and the powerful youkai Yuuka Kazami makes her first appearance. Alright, now you know this utterly useless piece of knowledge, congratulations :) Lotus Land Story cover
